text: Aur (unn kay liye) jo inn kay baad aayen jo kahen gay kay aey huamray perwerdigar humen baksh dey aur humaray unn bhaiyon ko bhi jo hum say pehlay eman laa chukay hain aur eman daaron ki taraf say humaray dil mein keena (aur dushmani) naa daal aey humaray rab be-shak tu shafqat aur meharbani kerney wala hai
